summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/10/20 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Steven Brill', 'Peter Farrelly', 'Steve Carr', 'Griffin Dunne', 'James Duffy', 'Elizabeth Banks', 'Brett Ratner', 'Will Graham', 'Jonathan Van Tulleken', 'Patrik Forsberg', 'James Gunn'], 'Producers': ['Charles B. Wessler', 'John Penotti', 'Peter Farrelly', 'Ryan Kavanaugh', 'Tim Williams', 'Tucker Tooley', 'Ron Burkle', 'Jason Beckman', 'Jason Colodne', 'Jason Felts'], 'Starring': ['Naomi Watts', 'Emma Stone', 'Chloë Grace Moretz'], 'Studio': ['RELATIVITY MEDIA']} Review Text: Okay, if I could rate this with 0 stars I would. I heard that this was a good movie with a bunch of actors in it. The bunch of actors part was true but this being a great movie was not! What made this worse was being almost done getting through this movie when my mom came in and decided to join my husband and I. So embarrassing!!
My husband and I have a lot of inside jokes. When we talk about watching a new movie, the decision to watch this movie is what makes him not agree with me on any of my choices. He says, "oh is it another Movie 43? Should be great then!" I hope you can sense the sarcasm.
If you like to watch movies with a lot of actors in it, you may enjoy this movie. Mostly, I was just glad to have finished it! Review Title: Don't Do It! Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/10/20 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Anne Fletcher'], 'Producers': ['David Hoberman', 'Todd Lieberman'], 'Starring': ['Sandra Bullock', 'Ryan Reynolds', 'Malin Akerman']} Review Text: If you love a good Romantic Comedy that includes Ryan Reynolds or Sandra Bullock than this movie is for you! It is a little predictable, but the best ones are. It's cute and fun and you'll love the journey that they take together through this movie. It definitely made me laugh for most of the movie. They should make a sequel... Review Title: Love a good Rom Com Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/10/20 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Português'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Louis Leterrier'], 'Producers': ['Bobby Cohen', 'Alex Kurtzman', 'Roberto Orci'], 'Starring': ['Jesse Eisenberg', 'Mark Ruffalo', 'Woody Harrelson'], 'Studio': ['Summit']} Review Text: I choose a lot of my movie choices by the actors that are in it and this was no exception. I have seen at least one great movie with these actors in it, and the premise looked interesting to say the least. I was actually intrigued throughout the whole movie and totally surprised by the ending! I thought about watching this movie again now that I know the ending but I haven't quite got around to it yet. I'm sure I'll watch it again before too long, but it was definitely worth the first watching! Review Title: Great Actors Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/10/20 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Seth Gordon'], 'Producers': ['Scott Stuber', 'Jason Bateman', 'Pamela Abdy'], 'Starring': ['Jason Bateman', 'Melissa McCarthy', 'Jon Favreau']} Review Text: I watched this the first time when it came out in movie theaters, but my Mom didn't come with us to the theater. She was excited to see it when it came out on DVD and I decided to join her for my second viewing. Even though I knew everything that was going to happen it was still just as funny as the first time I watched it! They really were a great duo in this movie and just the little bit of slapstick humor really makes this fun to watch. I'm kind of upset that I didn't just buy this and just rented it. Now I'll probably have to pay more to buy it so that I can watch it any time I want to laugh. Review Title: Second time, still good! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Veronica Mars Review Date: 2014/02/18 Categories: Suspense, Drama Product Description: ["In the wealthy, seaside community of Neptune, California, the rich and powerful make the rules. Unfortunately for them, there's Veronica Mars, a smart, fearless 17-year-old apprentice private investigator dedicated to solving the town's toughest mysteries."] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['John T. Kretchmer', 'Nick Marck', 'Michael Fields', 'Harry Winer', 'Jason Bloom', 'Steve Gomer', 'Guy Norman Bee', 'Marcos Siega', 'Sarah Pia Anderson', 'Mark Piznarski'], 'Producers': ['Not Specified'], 'Starring': ['Kristen Bell', 'Percy Daggs III', 'Teddy Dunn']} Review Text: I don't know how I missed this series when it was originally on tv but I wish I hadn't! Plus I watched it just in time for the movie to come out. It's greatfor everyone. My husband didn't want to like it but got hooked too. Review Title: How did I miss this? Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals a strong preference for engaging storytelling, particularly in the romantic comedy and suspense genres. The individual consistently favors movies featuring well-known actors, indicating a reliance on star power to guide selection, and demonstrates a tendency towards films that are entertaining despite predictability. 

Positive sentiments are prominently linked to humor and character dynamics, especially in films that combine light-hearted elements with romance. The highest ratings correlate with movies that are fun, involving and elicit laughter, while significantly lower ratings reflect dissatisfaction with perceived quality and awkward viewing experiences. 

Quality plays a pivotal role in decision-making, with a pattern suggesting the individual values entertaining plots, relatable characters, and strong performances. Price sensitivity is also indicated by comments on renting versus purchasing films, suggesting a willingness to invest in high-quality, repeat-viewable content. Overall, the individual's core preferences encompass a blend of humor, popular appeal, strong character portrayals, and a selective approach to genre, ultimately seeking enjoyable and memorable viewing experiences.

target_interaction.title: super cute!
target_interaction.text: This is such a cute movie. We've watched it multiple times in the theater and at home now that we own it. When you join Disneymoviesanywhere.com (it's free) you can add your disney movies to your collection and even store it for free on Amazon. That way we can literally watch it anywhere and still use our favorite movie service. Very convenient.
description: With all the heart and humor audiences expect from Walt Disney Animation Studios, BIG HERO 6 is an action-packed comedy adventure that introduces Baymax, a lovable, personal companion robot, who forms a special bond with robotics prodigy Hiro Hamada. When a devastating turn of events catapults them into the midst of a dangerous plot unfolding in the streets of San Fransokyo, Hiro turns to Baymax and his diverse group of friends -- adrenaline junky Go Go Tomago, neatnik Wasabi, chemistry whiz Honey Lemon and fanboy Fred -- who transform into a band of unlikely heroes. Bring home Disney's BIG HERO 6, featuring comic-book-style action and hilarious, unforgettable characters -- it's fun for the whole family!
